template.name: adt

variable.name: DATA_CONSTRUCTION1
variable.defaultValue: groovyScript("def extractNames(s) { parenStart = s.indexOf('('); if (parenStart < 0) { return s } else { name = s.substring(0, parenStart); parenEnd = s.indexOf(')'); params = s.substring(parenStart + 1, parenEnd).split(\",\").collect { it.trim() }; return name + \"(\" + params.collect { it.split(':').getAt(0) }.join(', ') + \")\"; } }\n return extractNames(_1);", DATA_NAME1)

variable.name: DATA_CONSTRUCTION2
variable.defaultValue: DATA_CONSTRUCT1=groovyScript("def extractNames(s) { parenStart = s.indexOf('('); if (parenStart < 0) { return s } else { name = s.substring(0, parenStart); parenEnd = s.indexOf(')'); params = s.substring(parenStart + 1, parenEnd).split(\",\").collect { it.trim() }; return name + \"(\" + params.collect { it.split(':').getAt(0) }.join(', ') + \")\"; } }\n return extractNames(_1);", DATA_NAME2)

variable.name: DATA_CONSTRUCTION
variable.defaultValue: groovyScript("def extractNames(s) { parenStart = s.indexOf('('); if (parenStart < 0) { return s } else { name = s.substring(0, parenStart); parenEnd = s.indexOf(')'); params = s.substring(parenStart + 1, parenEnd).split(\",\").collect { it.trim() }; return name + \"(\" + params.collect { it.split(':').getAt(0) }.join(', ') + \")\"; } }\n return extractNames(_1);", DATA_NAME)
